item.title: Mathematical Methods for Economics
item.description: Mathematics is central to undergraduate economics. The key is to learn only as much as is required for you to use economics in daily life. For my undergraduate class, I teach students to be street smart in mathematics and learn the maths which helps them get through undergraduate economics.

item.title: Macroeconomics II
item.description: Lectures notes from my course on macroeconomics at the OP Jindal Global University’s School of Government and Public Policy. Check out the latest debate about India’s macroeconomic policy in my lecture notes.
